attributes.action: Stop this Government's unreasonable victimisation of smokers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent suggestions have been made regarding the display of cigarettes in shops, with some "experts" calling for them to be removed from view and sold from beneath the counter. As well as providing very costly for retailers, this action would signify that the Government finds it more socially acceptable to sell a pornographic magazine (sometimes on display alongside TV magazines) than a packet of cigarettes.
